name: Goldenjar Fall
description:
Goldenjar Fall is an intense ARPG where the player will take the role of Korik the King of the Goldenjar clan, who will embark on a journey full of enemies and dangers that he will overcome using powerful ancient weapons and the skills granted by Thorgabart!

Key Features:

• Explore dangerous dungeons as you defeat hordes of enemies.
• Wield the power of the god of the dwarves separated into three different branches of powers.
• Wield the weapons forged by the clan's master craftsmen.
